category: Safety and Health Management Regulations/Article 28 (Issuance of Safety Work Permit, etc.)
contents: Article 28 (Issuance of Safe Work Permit, etc.) ① In case of contract construction, the Chairman shall have the contracting company conduct a risk assessment, and after reviewing the risk assessment conducted by the company, confirm measures to improve or reduce risk factors. , ② If there is a risk of falling, fire, suffocation, electric shock, etc. in the workplace due to facility construction, maintenance/repair work, etc. during contract construction, the chairman must issue a safety work permit before work. ③ Contractor risk Details regarding evaluation and issuance of safe work permits shall be determined separately by the Chairman.
